definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: The ear leather is thick, covered with soft short hair, and when measured, should reach the inner corner of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 耳皮豐厚，被軟短毛，如測量應可達眼睛內側角。

sentences.english: Firstly with almond aroma, full with intense and lovely peach aroma.
sentences.chinese: 入口杏仁味和白桃果味豐厚，活潑可喜，酸度充足。

sentences.english: The figure painting of Chen Laolian flourishes in a rich soil.
sentences.chinese: 陳老蓮的人物畫有其豐厚土壤。

sentences.english: Ripe and mature-tasting pear and apple flavors , some spicy notes mixed in .
sentences.chinese: 略帶桃，蘋果香，口感成熟豐厚，回味複雜濃烈。

sentences.english: He has loyal, and well paid, military officials to perform the role of figurehead.
sentences.chinese: 他自有受到他豐厚收買的忠實軍事領導當他的傀儡。

sentences.english: Inside the growing -- and very lucrative -- world of virtual currency. (AdWeek)
sentences.chinese: 揭祕日益壯大且利潤豐厚的虛擬貨幣世界。

sentences.english: Our company is engaged in the rigging for many years, experience rich, the technical force is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 本公司從事索具多年，經驗豐厚，技術力量雄厚。

sentences.english: We expect there will be lots of people going to buy tickets due to the snowballing jackpot.
sentences.chinese: 由於累積獎金豐厚，預期會有很多買今期的六合彩。

sentences.english: Mane and frill should be abundant, and particularly impressive in males.
sentences.chinese: 有豐厚的鬃毛和飾毛，而且雄性更爲明顯。

sentences.english: The financial rewards of successful bio-prospecting are likely to be significant.
sentences.chinese: 成功的生物開發有望得到豐厚的經濟回報。

sentences.english: The financial rewards of successful bio-prospecting are likely lo be significant.
sentences.chinese: 成功的生物開發有望得到豐厚的經濟回報。

sentences.english: The directors will each get a large golden handshake and a pension.
sentences.chinese: 所有的經理都會得到豐厚的退職金和養老費。

sentences.english: To this end, my mother has lost substantial section of country which overtime pay.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，媽媽失去了國興節豐厚的加班工資。

sentences.english: His lawyer wife, Michelle, had been a high-paid hospital executive.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子米歇爾一直擔任薪酬豐厚的醫院院長。

sentences.english: This red building is steeped in history.
sentences.chinese: 這座紅色的建築物有着豐厚的汗青閱歷。

sentences.english: Good jobs at good wages, producing American products for the world.
sentences.chinese: 這些優質工作收入豐厚，把美國產品推向了全球。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
